Title: Godzilla: Final Wars
Director: Ryûhei Kitamura, Koji Hashimoto, Shûsuke Kaneko, Toshio Masuda, Kazuki Ohmori, Takao Okawara, Masaaki Tezuka, Kenshô Yamashita
Writer: Isao Kiriyama (screenplay), Ryûhei Kitamura (screenplay), Wataru Mimura (story), Shogo Tomiyama (story)
Actors: Masahiro Matsuoka, Rei Kikukawa, Don Frye, Maki Mizuno
Plot: When the aliens Xilians invade Earth, they release monsters to destroy the big cities. The Earth Defense Force formed by mutants is incapable to defeat the creatures. Commander Douglas Gordon decides to unleash Godzilla that has been trapped for many years to fight against the monsters. Godzilla becomes the last hope on Earth to vanquish the evil aliens and the powerful Gigan.
